metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23304 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: The implementations of EAP-pwd in hostapd before 2.10 and wpa_supplicantbefore 2.10 are vulnerable to side-channel attacks as a result of cacheaccess patterns. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2019-9495.

criterions.comment: wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
